ABOUT ME

Hello there,

I'm Yishen üëã

Hello there, I'm Yishen üëã

I'm a photography enthusiast who started my journey in 2019 when I purchased my first camera. Since then, I've immersed myself in capturing moments that evoke emotions within me. Whether it's people or landscapes, I enjoy photographing scenes with stories that resonate deeply. I'm particularly passionate about exploring places I've never been before, with every trip and every shoot offering me a chance to discover new worlds.

Gear: Sony A7C2, Pentax MX, Canon 70D
